title: Baked Reuben with Noodles
ingredients: ['2 (295g) tins condensed cream of mushroom soup', '350ml milk', '1/4 small onion, chopped', '350g sliced salt beef brisket, chopped', '3 tablespoons mustard', '1 1/3 (700g) jars sauerkraut, drained and rinsed', '225g fresh egg noodles', '215g Gruyere cheese, grated', '30g butter, melted', '170g rye bread, cubed']
